de: Désaignes is over 2000 years old and was in its prime in the Middle Ages. The village is still teeming with relics: the remnants of a 12th century fortress, a 14th century château, ramparts and 3 of the 4 gateways to the village.
ru: Désaignes is over 2000 years old and was in its prime in the Middle Ages. The village is still teeming with relics: the remnants of a 12th century fortress, a 14th century château, ramparts and 3 of the 4 gateways to the village.
en: Désaignes is over 2000 years old and was in its prime in the Middle Ages. The village is still teeming with relics: the remnants of a 12th century fortress, a 14th century château, ramparts and 3 of the 4 gateways to the village.
it: Désaignes is over 2000 years old and was in its prime in the Middle Ages. The village is still teeming with relics: the remnants of a 12th century fortress, a 14th century château, ramparts and 3 of the 4 gateways to the village.
fr: Riche d'une histoire de plus de 2000 ans, Désaignes a connu son apogée au Moyen Age. Le village en conserve de nombreux témoins: les vestiges d'une forteresse du 12ème  s., un château du 14ème s., des remparts et 3 des 4 portes d'entrées de la ville.
zh: Désaignes is over 2000 years old and was in its prime in the Middle Ages. The village is still teeming with relics: the remnants of a 12th century fortress, a 14th century château, ramparts and 3 of the 4 gateways to the village.
es: Désaignes is over 2000 years old and was in its prime in the Middle Ages. The village is still teeming with relics: the remnants of a 12th century fortress, a 14th century château, ramparts and 3 of the 4 gateways to the village.
nl: Désaignes is meer dan 2000 jaar oud en was in de Middeleeuwen in de bloei. Het dorp wemelt nog steeds van de overblijfselen van een fort uit de 12e eeuw, een kasteel uit de 14e eeuw, wallen en 3 van de 4 poorten naar het dorp.

en: Désaignes : a village with outstanding character
